reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made and appreciate its soft material that softens beautifully, with one noting it's 92% viscose.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Long Sleeve Cardigan
items.body: This navy blue long-sleeve cardigan is a perfect layering piece, especially over dresses. The length and drape complement both casual and formal outfits, adding a polished touch without overwhelming the look. The single-button closure keeps it secure while allowing for a flowy, effortless fit. The fabric initially feels a little stiff, but after the first wash, it softens beautifully, making it much more comfortable to wear. It’s lightweight yet provides enough warmth for cooler days. The deep navy shade is rich and pairs effortlessly with various colors and patterns. I love how versatile this cardigan is—it works well for both daytime and evening wear. The sleeves are slightly fitted, so layering over bulkier fabrics can be tricky, but overall, it’s a stylish and reliable piece. If you need a classic cardigan that elevates your dresses while offering comfort, this one is a great choice! Read more
items.author: Lil' Penguin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised
items.body: True to size, comfortable and adorable! I love it. I always have trouble with the shoulders being wide enough and the sleeves long enough since I am 5’10”. This sweater fit me well. Thumbs up! Read more
items.author: Cindy Little

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and fits well
items.body: Good quality and holds up well with washing and drying. I did need to iron the corners down a little bit so that they would lay flat. It fits well and is accurate in size. The material is good quality for the price. The material is good and not itchy, not overly soft but comfortable to wear. The white is accurate in description and the style fits well. I would buy it again. Read more
items.author: Mileyah Leisure

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Navy color is good
items.body: Nice sweater. I ordered it despite the return frequency. It is exactly as described and fits true to size. The navy blue is very pretty. I had purchased a beige color which I did return the material seemed a bit thread bare, it had also been delivered wadded up with deep wrinkles. So it seems to be hit or miss with these sweaters. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
items.body: Soft very cute and easy to clean. Use it for formal and casual. Cold/ Luke warm water wash low heat dry and it still feels like I just got it. Read more
items.author: Sarah Burke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect
items.body: Fit and everything was perfect Read more
items.author: Vsieger

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Same sizes can vary in fit…
items.body: I bought this in 2 colors. The brown one fit perfectly but this black one, in the same size, was a whole size bigger. I’ll be returning it as it’s too big. I was going to buy a couple more different colors but since the fit varies and there’s no guarantee it will fit like the brown one, I decided not to order any more. Also the material was a different texture, not soft on the skin, but that wasn’t a big deal to me. The one that fit my 5’2” frame perfectly and looked very nice. I’m happy with that one. So if you want to take a chance on a fit that isn’t consistent, you might get lucky and receive a decent sweater. Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a dressy occasion
items.body: Exactly what was needed for sleeveless dress that will be worn to a wedding. It is a smooth knit material not a noticeable knit. I ordered the medium and the size was perfect. I am 5' 1", 128lbs and a 38B bra size. Definitely would recommend it. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A21-green, A18-mustard, A15-camel Heather, A02-white, A04-camel, A18-brown, A10-yellow, A11-royal Blue, A19-light Purple, A13-light Blue, A05-light Grey, A08-burgundy, A14-dark Grey, A20-light Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
